title: How to Edit the Perfect YouTube Video | Hayden Hillier-Smith
description: In this highly requested episode, Logan Paul's longtime editor and streamy award winner for Best Editing, Hayden Hillier-Smith joins the show to discuss his perspective on Youtube editing and working with an editor. Hayden is widely regarded as one of the best editors on YouTube and has helped take Logan Paul's channel to over 23 million subscribers. How does he use analytics to analyze video performance, how should creators hire an editor, what channels have the best editing right now? Hear it all on this latest episode of Creator Economics!
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
